name: Spooder the Spider in: Bad Bug
name_original: Spooder the Spider in: Bad Bug
description:
Help Spooder the Spider take down the Bad Bugs that are threatening his home!

For more info about the real spotted lantern fly click here!

Controls:
WASD + Space: movement and shooting
Left-click: attach web
Right-click: detach web
R: reset
Z: zoom out
T: show game timer
